channel.title: My friends server. Why can't i connect i could connect before he updated but,,,
channel.description:
My friends server. Why can't i connect i could connect before he updated but..
what should I do because i want to play but im not sure if it is me or him because when i try to connect it says "error conencting to server" as if it is not online i have pinged it a few times when its online and it says it is offline to me. why?

item.title: My friends server. Why can't i connect i could connect before he updated but,,,

item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

[quote=“madmanisbad1, post:1, topic:218175”]My friends server. Why can’t i connect i could connect before he updated but…

what should I do because i want to play but im not sure if it is me or him because when i try to connect
it says “error conencting to server” as if it is not online i have pinged it a few times when its online and it says it is offline to me. why?[/quote]

How are we going to know?
